article_title: Warren Buffett Should Buy AutoNation Says Berkshire Hathaway Shareholder Mario Gabelli
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: Warren Buffett should consider buying AutoNation (AN) to add to his portfolio of companies, says Mario Gabelli, Chairman and CEO of GAMCO Investors and Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A).
article_metadata.author: Rhonda Schaffler
